sections.heading: pursuit; state, defined.For purposes of the Uniform Act on Fresh Pursuit, the word state shall include the District of Columbia

sections.text:
29-419.Fresh pursuit; state, defined.

For purposes of the Uniform Act on Fresh Pursuit, the word state shall include the District of Columbia.

SourceLaws 1937, c. 70, § 4, p. 256;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 29-419;R.S.1943, § 29-419;Laws 2001, LB 299, § 2.
